thread.title: Joe Rodriguez
thread.title_full: Optima Tax Relief reviewed by Joe Rodriguez

author: Joe Rodriguez
title: Joe Rodriguez
text: I missed a call from optima tax relief, in learning this I called back and left a message. Not hearing back from them I got concerned so I called again. This time someone answered and told me I couldn't leave a message unless I gave them a time when they could call me back. Not having a good time to tell them, she wouldn't take my message. I got upset, so I waited a few days then called back and spoke to someone else. I explained what happened and she related my message to the right people. They called me back right away and answered all my questions. She was very nice and helpful, I am glad I called back . I chose Optima tax relief for a reason, professional service and excellent satisfaction. I'm glad your in my corner, thanks a lot
